scripts.install-all: npm install && cd raktar-backend && npm install && cd ../raktar-frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "bgBlue,bgMagenta" "cd raktar-backend && npm run start:dev" "cd raktar-frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.init: npm run install-all && cd raktar-backend && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev --name init && npx prisma db seed && cd .. && npm run dev
scripts.update: cd raktar-backend && npx prisma migrate reset --force && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db seed && cd .. && npm run dev
